casebody.data:
WALLY, et al.
v.
CITY OF KANNOPOLIS. No. 58P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. T.C. Morphis, Jr., Hickory, Attorney at Law, for Wally, Fred, et al. Rebecca K. Cheney, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for City of Kannapolis. Keith J. Merritt, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for City of Kannapolis. Melanie J. Raubach, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for City of Kannapolis.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of July 2015 by Plaintiffs to Amend Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
ERVIN, J., recused.
